column4: '~$ LANG=C man console-setup; No manual entry for console-setup' What is the associated command for console-setup?
!it | sandro
setupcon
Thank you for your help.
What IRC network does provide an amateur radio channel?
This is for the www multiplexer. It is most likely not enabled on you system.
http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=www+multiplexer: "The page "Www multiplexer" does not exist." What do you mean by »www multiplexer«, please?
I'm not responsible for the content on Wikipedia. I never advised you to use Wikipedia nor did I made any reference to that site.
You did not answer my question.
That's for the TCP Multiplexer. Did you get my anser?
It's not actively used. The idea is to connect to a port, in yur case port 80, and wait for a response from the target systen. The response is either + or -.
Read RFC 1078.
It's a socket.
I don't think so. '~$ file /proc/mtd; /proc/mtd: empty.'

Yes.
